abstract: In 2011, there were more than 50,000 arrests, more than in the whole period 1978 to 1996. A 6 percent increase during the first 8 months of the year more than offset a drop after the police were instructed in September to follow the letter of the law.

headline.main: Marijuana Arrests Rose in 2011, Despite Police Directive
headline.print_headline: Marijuana Arrests Rose in 2011, Even With Directive to the Police
